### Survival analysis definitions and results

{{< include _eq-def-surv.qmd >}}

{{< include _eq-def-hazard.qmd >}}

{{< include _surv_diagram.qmd >}}

Non-informative censoring:

$$
\ba
\p(Y=y,D=d) 
&= [\pdf_T(y)]^{d} [\surv_T(y)]^{1-d}
\\
&= [\haz_T(y)]^{d} [\surv_T(y)]
\ea
$$

Proportional hazards model:

$$\diffloghaz(t|\vx) = \reglincomb$$
$$\haz(t|x) = \haz_0(t)\theta(x)$$
$$\cuhaz(t|x) = \cuhaz_0(t)\theta(x)$$
